description:
Protect the floor of your Big Agnes Gold Camp UL 3 Mesh Inner and extend its useful life. The footprint also allows for a canopy-free ultralight setup when paired with the Gold Camp UL 3 Tarp.

  • Tear resistant polyester ripstop with a waterproof polyurethane coating
  • Reinforced patch for center support pole
name: Big Agnes Gold Camp 3-Person UL Footprint
